General.Name: Value Management & Research AG
General.Description: NSI Asset AG invests in advisory, financial portfolio management, investment brokerage, and brokerage and proprietary businesses in Germany. It offers digitizing online based financial services; online fund discounter services; and online-based brokerage business. The company was formerly known as Value Management & Research AG and changed its name to NSI Asset AG in July 2022. NSI Asset AG was founded in 1993 and is based in Kronberg im Hamburg, Germany.
